entities.name: death eaters
entities.description: A group of people who follow and serve Lord Voldemort. They are mentioned in the text as being honored beyond their dreams by the Lestranges.

entities.name: lestranges
entities.description: A family that will be honored beyond their dreams by the Death Eaters. They are not explicitly mentioned again in the text.

entities.name: dementors
entities.description: Supernatural creatures that are considered natural allies of the Death Eaters. They will join them according to Voldemort's plan.

entities.name: giants
entities.description: Supernatural creatures that were banished and will be recalled by Voldemort.

entities.name: macnair
entities.description: A Death Eater who is destroying dangerous beasts for the Ministry of Magic. He is spoken to by Voldemort.

entities.name: wormtail
entities.description: A person who informs Voldemort about Macnair's activities.

entities.name: voldemort
entities.description: The leader of the Death Eaters. He is planning to provide better victims for his followers.

entities.name: crabbe
entities.description: A large hooded figure who is spoken to by Voldemort.

entities.name: goyle
entities.description: Another large hooded figure who is spoken to by Voldemort.

entities.name: nott
entities.description: A person who is spoken to quietly by Voldemort.

relationships.description: Voldemort is the leader of the Death Eaters, and they follow him.
